title: Bottom Navigation disappear after saving language
body: **Describe the bug** Bottom Navigation disappear after saving language. **Expected behavior** It should not disappear. **Steps to reproduce the behavior:** * Go to Download Fragment. * Click on language icon. * Select any language and click on save icon. * You will see bottom navigation is disappear. **Screenshots** **Video** https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34593983/213103460-b406d690-b0a1-4f0c-9f43-ca65f0c01b6e.mp4 **Environment** - Version of Kiwix Android : Current develop branch (3.6.0). - Device : Redmi Note 9 - OS version : Android 12 **Logs** ``` W/System.err: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Method setCurrentState must be called on the main thread W/System.err: at androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleRegistry.enforceMainThreadIfNeeded(LifecycleRegistry.java:323) W/System.err: at androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleRegistry.setCurrentState(LifecycleRegistry.java:120) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavBackStackEntry.updateState(NavBackStackEntry.kt:185) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavBackStackEntry.setMaxLifecycle(NavBackStackEntry.kt:156) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController.popEntryFromBackStack(NavController.kt:675) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController.access$popEntryFromBackStack(NavController.kt:68) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController$popBackStackInternal$2.invoke(NavController.kt:560) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController$popBackStackInternal$2.invoke(NavController.kt:557) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController$NavControllerNavigatorState.pop(NavController.kt:324) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.fragment.FragmentNavigator.popBackStack(FragmentNavigator.kt:103) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController.popBackStackInternal(NavController.kt:274) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController.popBackStackInternal(NavController.kt:557) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController.popBackStack(NavController.kt:472) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController.popBackStack(NavController.kt:449) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController.popBackStack(NavController.kt:434) W/System.err: at androidx.navigation.NavController$onBackPressedCallback$1.handleOnBackPressed(NavController.kt:191) W/System.err: at androidx.activity.OnBackPressedDispatcher.onBackPressed(OnBackPressedDispatcher.java:192) W/System.err: at androidx.activity.ComponentActivity.onBackPressed(ComponentActivity.java:657) W/System.err: at org.kiwix.kiwixmobile.core.main.CoreMainActivity.onBackPressed(CoreMainActivity.kt:244) W/System.err: at org.kiwix.kiwixmobile.language.viewmodel.SaveLanguagesAndFinish.invokeWith$lambda-1(SaveLanguagesAndFinish.kt:36) W/System.err: at org.kiwix.kiwixmobile.language.viewmodel.SaveLanguagesAndFinish.$r8$lambda$eVDOCRbgnNlpnMjQBZ0akm2A8bs(Unknown Source:0) W/System.err: at org.kiwix.kiwixmobile.language.viewmodel.SaveLanguagesAndFinish$$ExternalSyntheticLambda1.accept(Unknown Source:4) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.internal.subscribers.LambdaSubscriber.onNext(LambdaSubscriber.java:65) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.internal.operators.flowable.FlowableSubscribeOn$SubscribeOnSubscriber.onNext(FlowableSubscribeOn.java:97) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.internal.subscriptions.DeferredScalarSubscription.complete(DeferredScalarSubscription.java:132) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.internal.operators.flowable.FlowableFromCallable.subscribeActual(FlowableFromCallable.java:50) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.Flowable.subscribe(Flowable.java:14935) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.Flowable.subscribe(Flowable.java:14882) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.internal.operators.flowable.FlowableSubscribeOn$SubscribeOnSubscriber.run(FlowableSubscribeOn.java:82) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.internal.schedulers.ScheduledRunnable.run(ScheduledRunnable.java:66) W/System.err: at io.reactivex.internal.schedulers.ScheduledRunnable.call(ScheduledRunnable.java:57) W/System.err: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:264) W/System.err: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:307) ```
